content: the pattern is available in english norwegian and swedish a cool headband with a pretty structure a quick project suitable for both little boys and little girls sizes 1-2 years 3-5 years 6-8 years yarn suggestion viking garn merino yarn amount 50 50 50 g needles circular needles size 3 5 mm 40 cm gauge 22 m stocking stitches on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 cm instagram #hjalmarheadband #hjalmarpannebånd #hjalmarpannband @asynjadesign
